title: Revenue of Starwood Hotels & Resorts 2005 to 2015
summary: Overall Revenue in billion U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Revenue in billion U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 2006 to 2008, slightly decreasing from 2008 to 2009, gradually increasing from 2009 to 2012, and lastly roughly constant from 2012 to 2013.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2008 and 2009.
Maximum Revenue in billion U.S. dollars, about 6.32 was reported at Year 2012
The lowest Revenue in billion U.S. dollars, of value 4.7 was reported at Year 2009
min_summary: In general Revenue in billion U.S. dollars has stayed the same over the Year.
Revenue in billion U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 2006 to 2008, slightly decreasing from 2008 to 2009, gradually increasing from 2009 to 2012, and lastly roughly constant from 2012 to 2013.
